verses.verse: And after<WG3326> the uproar<WG2351> was ceased,<WG3973> Paul<WG3972> called<WG4341> to him the disciples,<WG3101> and embraced<WG782> them, and departed<WG1831> for to go<WG4198> into<WG1519> Macedonia.<WG3109>
And when he had gone<WG1330> over<WG1330> those<WG1565> parts,<WG3313> and had given them much<WG4183> exhortation,<WG3870> he came<WG2064> into<WG1519> Greece,<WG1671>

And there stayed<WG4160> three<WG5140> months.<WG3376> And when the Jews<WG2453> laid<WG1096> wait<WG1096> <WG1917> for him, as he was about<WG3195> to sail<WG321> into<WG1519> Syria,<WG4947> he purposed<WG1096> <WG1106> to return<WG5290> through<WG1223> Macedonia.<WG3109>

And there accompanied<WG4902> him into<WG891> Asia<WG773> Sopater<WG4986> of Berea;<WG960> and of the Thessalonians,<WG2331> Aristarchus<WG708> and Secundus;<WG4580> and Gaius<WG1050> of Derbe,<WG1191> and Timotheus;<WG5095> and of Asia,<WG773> Tychicus<WG5190> and Trophimus.<WG5161>
These<WG3778> going<WG4281> before<WG4281> tarried<WG3306> for us at<WG1722> Troas.<WG5174>

And we sailed<WG1602> away<WG1602> from Philippi<WG5375> after<WG3326> the days<WG2250> of unleavened<WG106> bread, and came<WG2064> to them to Troas<WG5174> in five<WG4002> days;<WG2250> where<WG3757> we stayed<WG1304> seven<WG2033> days.<WG2250>

And on the first<WG3391> day of the week,<WG4521> when the disciples<WG3101> came<WG4863> together<WG4863> to break<WG2806> bread,<WG740> Paul<WG3972> preached<WG1256> to them, ready<WG3195> to depart<WG1826> on the morrow;<WG1887> and continued<WG3905> his speech<WG3056> until<WG3360> midnight.<WG3317>
And there were many<WG2425> lights<WG2985> in the upper<WG5253> chamber,<WG5253> where<WG3757> they were gathered<WG4863> together.<WG4863>

And there sat<WG2521> in a window<WG2376> a certain<WG5100> young<WG3494> man<WG3494> named<WG3686> Eutychus,<WG2161> being fallen<WG2702> into a deep<WG901> sleep:<WG5258> and as Paul<WG3972> was long<WG1909> <WG4119> preaching,<WG1256> he sunk<WG2702> down<WG2736> with sleep,<WG5258> and fell<WG4098> down from the third<WG5152> loft,<WG5152> and was taken<WG142> up dead.<WG3498>
And Paul<WG3972> went<WG2597> down,<WG2597> and fell<WG1968> on<WG1968> him, and embracing<WG4843> him said,<WG2036> Trouble<WG2350> not yourselves; for his life<WG5590> is in him.

When he therefore<WG3767> was come<WG305> up again, and had broken<WG2806> bread,<WG740> and eaten,<WG1089> and talked<WG3656> a long<WG2425> while, even till<WG891> break<WG827> of day,<WG827> so<WG3779> he departed.<WG1831>
And they brought<WG71> the young<WG3816> man alive,<WG2198> and were not a little<WG3357> comforted.<WG3870>

And we went<WG4281> before<WG4281> to ship,<WG4143> and sailed<WG321> to Assos,<WG789> there<WG1564> intending<WG3195> to take<WG353> in Paul:<WG3972> for so<WG3779> had he appointed,<WG1299> minding<WG3195> himself<WG846> to go afoot.<WG3978>
And when<WG5613> he met<WG4820> with us at<WG1519> Assos,<WG789> we took<WG353> him in, and came<WG2064> to Mitylene.<WG3412>

And we sailed<WG636> there,<WG1564> and came<WG2064> the next<WG1966> day over<WG481> against<WG481> Chios;<WG5508> and the next<WG2087> day we arrived<WG3846> at<WG1519> Samos,<WG4544> and tarried<WG3306> at<WG1722> Trogyllium;<WG5175> and the next<WG2192> day we came<WG2064> to Miletus.<WG3399>

For Paul<WG3972> had determined<WG2919> to sail<WG3896> by Ephesus,<WG2181> because<WG3704> he would<WG1096> not spend<WG5551> the time<WG5551> in Asia:<WG773> for he hurried,<WG4692> if<WG1487> it were possible<WG1415> for him, to be at<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414> the day<WG2250> of Pentecost.<WG4005>
And from Miletus<WG3399> he sent<WG3992> to Ephesus,<WG2181> and called<WG3333> the elders<WG4245> of the church.<WG1577>

And when<WG5613> they were come<WG3854> to him, he said<WG2036> to them, You know,<WG1987> from the first<WG4413> day<WG2250> that I came<WG1910> into<WG1519> Asia,<WG773> after<WG4459> what manner<WG4458> I have been<WG1096> with you at all<WG3956> seasons,<WG5550>

Serving<WG1398> the LORD<WG2962> with all<WG3956> humility<WG5012> of mind, and with many<WG4183> tears,<WG1144> and temptations,<WG3986> which<WG3588> befell<WG4819> me by the lying in wait<WG1917> of the Jews:<WG2453>

And how<WG5613> I kept<WG5288> back<WG5288> nothing<WG3762> that was profitable<WG4851> to you, but have<WG2192> showed<WG312> you, and have<WG2192> taught<WG1321> you publicly,<WG1219> and from house<WG3624> to house,<WG3624>

Testifying<WG1263> both<WG5037> to the Jews,<WG2453> and also<WG2532> to the Greeks,<WG1672> repentance<WG3341> toward<WG1519> God,<WG2316> and faith<WG4102> toward<WG1519> our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
And now,<WG3568> behold,<WG2400> I go<WG4198> bound<WG1210> in the spirit<WG4151> to Jerusalem,<WG2419> not knowing<WG1492> the things that shall befall<WG4876> me there:<WG1722>
Save<WG4133> that the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> witnesses<WG1263> in every<WG2596> city,<WG4172> saying<WG3004> that bonds<WG1199> and afflictions<WG2347> abide<WG3306> me.

But none<WG3762> of these things<WG3056> move<WG3056> <WG4160> me, neither<WG3761> count<WG2192> I my life<WG5590> dear<WG5093> to myself,<WG1683> so<WG5613> that I might finish<WG5048> my course<WG1408> with joy,<WG5479> and the ministry,<WG1248> which<WG3739> I have<WG2192> received<WG2983> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> to testify<WG1263> the gospel<WG2098> of the grace<WG5485> of God.<WG2316>

And now,<WG3568> behold,<WG2400> I know<WG1492> that you all,<WG3956> among<WG1722> whom<WG3739> I have<WG2192> gone<WG1330> preaching<WG2784> the kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316> shall see<WG3700> my face<WG4383> no<WG3765> more.<WG3765>
Why<WG1352> I take you to record<WG3143> this<WG4594> day,<WG4594> that I am pure<WG2513> from the blood<WG129> of all<WG3956> men.
For I have<WG2192> not shunned<WG5288> to declare<WG312> to you all<WG3956> the counsel<WG1012> of God.<WG2316>

Take heed<WG4337> therefore to yourselves,<WG1438> and to all<WG3956> the flock,<WG4168> over<WG1722> the which<WG3739> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> has made<WG5087> you overseers,<WG1985> to feed<WG4165> the church<WG1577> of God,<WG2316> which<WG3739> he has purchased<WG4046> with his own<WG2398> blood.<WG129>
For I know<WG1492> this,<WG5124> that after<WG3326> my departing<WG867> shall grievous<WG926> wolves<WG3074> enter<WG1525> in among<WG1519> you, not sparing<WG5339> the flock.<WG4168>
Also<WG2532> of your<WG5216> own selves<WG846> shall men<WG435> arise,<WG450> speaking<WG2980> perverse<WG1294> things, to draw<WG645> away<WG645> disciples<WG3101> after<WG3694> them.

Therefore<WG1352> watch,<WG1127> and remember,<WG3421> that by the space<WG5148> of three<WG5148> years<WG5148> I ceased<WG3973> not to warn<WG3560> every<WG1538> one<WG1520> night<WG3571> and day<WG2250> with tears.<WG1144>

And now,<WG3568> brothers,<WG80> I commend<WG3908> you to God,<WG2316> and to the word<WG3056> of his grace,<WG5485> which<WG3588> is able<WG1410> to build<WG2026> you up, and to give<WG1325> you an inheritance<WG2817> among<WG1722> all<WG3956> them which are sanctified.<WG37>
I have<WG2192> coveted<WG1937> no<WG3762> man's<WG3762> silver,<WG694> or<WG2228> gold,<WG5553> or<WG2228> apparel.<WG2441>
Yes,<WG1161> you yourselves<WG846> know,<WG1097> that these<WG3778> hands<WG5495> have<WG2192> ministered<WG5256> to my necessities,<WG5532> and to them that were with me.

I have<WG2192> showed<WG5263> you all<WG3956> things, how that so<WG3779> laboring<WG2872> you ought<WG1163> to support<WG482> the weak,<WG770> and to remember<WG3421> the words<WG3056> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> how<WG3754> he said,<WG2036> It is more<WG3122> blessed<WG3107> to give<WG1325> than to receive. <WG2983>
And when he had thus<WG5023> spoken,<WG2036> he kneeled<WG5087> <WG1119> down, and prayed<WG4336> with them all.<WG3956>
And they all<WG3956> wept<WG1096> <WG2805> sore,<WG2425> and fell<WG1968> on<WG1909> Paul's<WG3972> neck,<WG5137> and kissed<WG2705> him,

Sorrowing<WG3600> most<WG3122> of all<WG3122> for the words<WG3056> which<WG3739> he spoke,<WG2046> that they should<WG3195> see<WG2334> his face<WG4383> no<WG3765> more.<WG3765> And they accompanied<WG4311> him to the ship.<WG4143>
